content.raw: @scpeters I like your idea to add an example of gravity compensation with a more complex robot at the end of the tutorial. However, the PR2 appears to already hold its pose without gravity compensation (by a combination of joint damping and limits I think). Perhaps the UR10 could work as an example? I see a model for it in `gazebo_models`.
content.html: @scpeters I like your idea to add an example of gravity compensation with a more complex robot at the end of the tutorial. However, the PR2 appears to already hold its pose without gravity compensation (by a combination of joint damping and limits I think). Perhaps the UR10 could work as an example? I see a model for it in gazebo_models.
